summary: THE CAR HAS BEEN TO THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT FOR THE DRIVER SIDE TAIL LIGHT BULB TO BE REPLACED TWICE.  BULB REPLACEMENT ONLY FIXES THE PROBLEM FOR 2 TO 3 DAYS.  THERE IS SOME TYPE OF SHORT AND I KEEP GETTING HIT WITH A SERVICE CHARGE EVERY TIME THE VEHICLE GOES IN FOR THIS.  ALSO THE DRIVER SIDE SEAT IS SHOWING SOME  BEYOND NORMAL WEAR AND TEAR FOR A VEHICLE WITH ONLY 25K.  THE LEATHER SEATING SURFACE IS TEARING AT THE SEAMS AND APPEARS TO BE OF VERY THIN MATERIALS IN THE BOLSTER AREA.    *NLM
